import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import ContactSec from "../../Sections/Contact"; const Prospect = (props) => { const [code, setCode] = useState(uuidv4()); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [accountNumber, setAccountNumber] = useState(""); const [reduction, setReduction] = useState(""); const form = useRef(); return (
setEmail(e.target.value)} id="email" name="email" />
setAccountNumber(e.target.value)} id="accountNumber" name="accountNumber" />
); }; export default Prospect;
